description.displayText: Alexis is fantastic! She is incredibly responsible, mature, always on time, courteous, and my kids love her!
description.originalText: Alexis is fantastic! She is incredibly responsible, mature, always on time, courteous, and my kids love her!

description.displayText: Alexis is the most dependable child care provider! As a mom, it can be hard to trust just anyone with your children, we couldn't ask for better caretakers for our little ones. They love her and treat her like family. Alexis is caring, punctual, and a great communicator.
description.originalText: Alexis is the most dependable child care provider! As a mom, it can be hard to trust just anyone with your children, we couldn't ask for better caretakers for our little ones. They love her and treat her like family. Alexis is caring, punctual, and a great communicator.

description.displayText: We met Alexis as dance leader at vacation Bible school. My kids loved her, and she loved my kids. Alexis knows how to redirect and make things fun.
description.originalText: We met Alexis as dance leader at vacation Bible school. My kids loved her, and she loved my kids. Alexis knows how to redirect and make things fun.

description.displayText: Alexis is the kind of caregiver that is so thoughtful, consistent, and caring that she easily became a part of our family. We enjoyed the bond she created with our little babe and were so impressed by her ability to support our kiddos with the parenting styles and instructions we gave her. She was respectful and always trying new things and exploring with our kiddo under a year. She has always been consistent in staying up with the kiddos needs and special instructions we had asked of her. We have missed her since she moved to New York but have been blessed with a relationship that has stayed full of care as she has checked-in and sent her love from afar. Truly, you're very lucky to find Alexis available as she makes an extraordinary caregiver to children of all ages.

description.displayText: Alexis is the type of childcare provider that is so helpful, consistent, and caring that she easily becomes a part of your family. She is a punctual, dedicated, and loving support system for my family. We have missed here since she moved to New York but have been so blessed by her consistent check-ins and drop bys when she's in town! She is great with children of all ages and can keep up with any interests/special requirements your child might have. Truly, you're very lucky to find such a great person available to watch your kiddos! Feel free to reach out with any more questions .

description.displayText: Alexis took care of my 2 children on an as-needed basis from the time they were 3 and 5 until they were 6 and 8 years old.  Both kids ADORED her and were always happy when she took care of them.  Alexis was always on time, had a great attitude, was consistent with expectations for the kids.  I also appreciated Alexis' flexibility.  For example, I once had a flight delay while Alexis was watching the kids and she helped me out by staying with them an extra couple of hours until I was able to get home.  I would 100% recommend that you hire Alexis!
